PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-03072013-03-21FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActBank Act
SubjectComplaints (Banks, Authorized Foreign Banks and External Complaint Bodies) Regulations
PrecisCOMPLAINTS (BANKS, AUTHORIZED FOREIGN BANKS AND EXTERNAL COMPLAINTS BODIES) REGULATIONS in order to (1) set high standards that external complaints bodies must meet to ensure that they are accessible, accountable, impartial and independent, and that they discharge their functions and perform their activities in a transparent, effective, timely and cooperative manner; and (2) ensure that banks and authorized foreign banks are accountable to their customers and to the public regarding their complaint handling processes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0048 Publication Date: 2013-04-10
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Complaints (Banks, Authorized Foreign Banks and External Complaint Bodies) Regulations
precis: COMPLAINTS (BANKS, AUTHORIZED FOREIGN BANKS AND EXTERNAL COMPLAINTS BODIES) REGULATIONS in order to (1) set high standards that external complaints bodies must meet to ensure that they are accessible, accountable, impartial and independent, and that they discharge their functions and perform their activities in a transparent, effective, timely and cooperative manner; and (2) ensure that banks and authorized foreign banks are accountable to their customers and to the public regarding their complaint handling processes.
